data.title: Salazar - Lagenealogy.net
data.text: Ahnentafel of Hector brn.St.Just de Salazar --- 1st Generation --- 1. Hector brn.St.Just de Salazar (Rene Jette, Traite de Genealogie (Canada: U.Montreal, 1991). Hereinafter cited as Jette.) (Chesnaye-Desbois et Badier, Dictionnaire de la Noblesse Maisons des Europe, (Paris: Chez Schlessinger, ca.1865), all. Hereinafter cited as "Chesnaye-Desbois.") (Ibid.) (Ibid.). , b. in 1445? Champagne (a guess by author (NA), by M.W.Talbot.). , m. Helene de Chastellux in 1489 (Geanealogical Database Network, online http://www.geneanet.org/geneweb/, michou. Hereinafter cited as GenWeb.). , d. on 10 May 1502 St.Just, Champagne; Gouverneur et bailli d'Auxerre. --- 2nd Generation --- 2. Jean sgr.St.Just, Montagu de Salazar (" Chesnaye-Desbois, sal.) (Jette.). , b. circa 1410 Muskiz, Vizcaya, Spain (a guess.). See St.Jeanne d' Arc. companion of Joan of Arc at relief of Orleans battle in 1429. See Louis 11 lePrudent France,King. Jean saved the life of the future king at the battle of Montlhery in 1437. , m.contr. on 31 Oct 1441 Sully-sur-Loire. , m. Marie Marguerite dm.St.Fargeau de La Tremoille on 18 Nov 1441 cht.Sully. , m. Marie de Braque after 1457. , d. on 12 Nov 1479 Troyes, Champagne. 3. Marie Marguerite dm.St.Fargeau de La Tremoille (" Chesnaye-Desbois.) (Jette.) (" Chesnaye-Desbois.) (Leo van de Pas, "Genealogics, Database," Soc.Gen.Medieval, NA. Hereinafter cited as "van de Pas."). , b. in 1425? Poitou? (a guess.). , m.contr. on 31 Oct 1441 Sully-sur-Loire. . , d. on 12 Nov 1457 St.Just-Sauvage, Champagne (GenWeb, online http://www.geneanet.org/geneweb/, michou.). --- 3rd Generation --- 4. Lope de Montano de Somorrostro de Salazar witnessed http://somo.blogcindario.com/2008/06/00172-juan-de-salazar-de-muskiz-quot-el-grancapitan-quot.html possible ancestor of Jean b.St.Just de Salazar. , b. in 1380? Vizcaya, Spain. , m. Juana Gutierrez de Escalante. 5. Juana Gutierrez de Escalante. , b. in 1380? Sp. . 6. Georges ct.Guines dela Tremoille (" Chesnaye-Desbois.) (Ibid.) (Ibid.). , b. circa 1386 Poitou. He and Marie dite laChampionne Guypaude were not married not married. , m. Catherine d'Isle Bouchard on 2 Jul 1425. , d. on 6 May 1446. 7. Marie dite laChampionne Guypaude (Ibid.) (van de Pas .). , b. in 1400? France (a guess.). She and Georges ct.Guines dela Tremoille were not married not married. --- 4th Generation --- 8. Juan Sanchez sn.Somorrostro y San Martin de Salazar (Alberto y Arturo Garcia Carraffa Diccionario Herald.y Geneal.de Apillados, all (Madrid: Spain, 1948). Hereinafter cited as Caraffa.). , b. in 1340? Vizcaya, Spain (a guess.). , m. Maria Sanchez de Zamudio. , d. in Sep 1399 San Martin deMunatones (GenWeb, online http://www.geneanet.org/geneweb/, aberaza.). 9. Maria Sanchez de Zamudio (Caraffa.) (Ibid.). , b. in 1340? Vizcaya, Spain (a guess.). . 10. Juan 'el Ciego' Gutierrez de Escalante. , b. in 1350? Sp. 12. Guy 6 sgr.dela Tremoille (" Chesnaye-Desbois.). , b. in 1346 Poitou. , m. Marie heir.Craon de Sully in Jan 1383. , d. in 1398 Rhodes. 13. Marie heir.Craon de Sully (Ibid.). , b. in 1360? Berry (a guess.). . . --- 5th Generation --- 16. Juan Lopez sn.Nograro y San Martin de Salazar (Caraffa.) (Ibid.). , b. in 1300? Castile (a guess.). , m. Ines de Munatones. , d. circa 1376. 17. Ines de Munatones (Caraffa.) (Ibid.). , b. in 1310? Spain (a guess.). . 18. Furtado Sanchez sr.Susunaga de Zamudio (Caraffa.) (GenWeb, online http://www.geneanet.org/geneweb/, aberaza.). , b. in 1320? Vizcaya (a guess.). , m. Maria Diaz sra.delSolar Viejo de Leguizamon. 19. Maria Diaz sra.delSolar Viejo de Leguizamon (Caraffa.). , b. in 1320? Spain (a guess.). . 24. Guy 5 sgr.dela Tremoille (" Chesnaye-Desbois.). , b. in 1315? Poitou (a guess.). , m. Radegonde de Guenand in 1336. , d. on 18 Aug 1350. __________________________________________________________________________ Page 1
